actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to require that all covered workers be informed annually of their contributions and potential benefit rights (based on their then current wage records).
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to require the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to annually inform individuals covered by the OASDI program of their contributions and potential benefit rights, as based on their current wage records.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to require that all covered workers be informed annually of their contributions and potential benefit rights (based on their then current wage records).
